top_categories.workout_context: 64ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
Wish One Millau's French plateau, Grands Causses forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 70 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Wish One Millau's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before June.
When someone attacks on french plateau gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
At Wish One Millau, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Wish One Millau. Train it until it feels boring.
70 miles on french plateau gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
Varied gradients on french plateau gravel demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Wish One Millau, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Base fitness for Wish One Millau. Without this, the hard workouts break you down instead of building you up.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on french plateau gravel. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Wish One Millau’s 70 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Wish One Millau. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Wish One Millau requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on french plateau gravel to build confidence. Expect: french plateau, grands causses, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 70 miles of french plateau gravel in Millau Grands Causses, France.
